thread.section_title: CarTrawler Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CarTrawler | www.cartrawler.com | 21 of 805
thread.title: K Ashton

author: K Ashton
title: K Ashton
text: It was my first time picking up a car and with a long drive ahead I was anxious. There were not enough automatic cars available and at first I chose a small gear car then thought better of it as it was 5 years since I had driven one, because of arthritis in my hands.There was a long unknown drive ahead when I had picked up the car and I was worrying. Car trawler helped me change to an automatic without any fuss. Thank you. I enjoyed my driving.
